physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient presented with progressive fat deposition of the neck, face, and upper back, muscle wasting of the extremities, severe proximal myopathy, easy bruising, and spontaneous ecchymosis formation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient complained of worsening discomfort and deteriorating range of motion in the neck with growing fat deposition, worsening distress over the progressive physical deformity.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient reported increased neck mobility and improved self-esteem following ultrasound-assisted liposuction and lipectomy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The cosmetic appearance improved significantly after surgery, leading to a positive psychological impact on the patient.
